Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package nginx for versions less than 1.25.4-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package nginx for versions less than 1.25.4-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package nginx is earlier than 1.25.4-1, affected by CVE-2023-44487
